K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-1: gra ha m'a tri ka n'a ma dha ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-3: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-25: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-26: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-27: byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs cig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:168b-28: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @169a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-1: po rdo rje gtum po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i spyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa @169b byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-1: bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-8: yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-9: de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying gar bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-13: drag shul can gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-14: khro ba khro ba'i gzugs can dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-15: sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:169b-18: kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-3: de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-5: gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen bas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-7: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-8: gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-9: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-11: bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-12: de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-13: gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-14: gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-15: ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-16: lha rnams dang ni lha min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-17: mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170a-18: gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-0: mi rnams dang ni @170b mi ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-1: drag po gzi brjid chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-2: khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-3: gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-4: rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste ga' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so; ;de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:170b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-0: sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur @171a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-5: aom sh'i tam sha be sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-6: aom rakta aam ga ku m'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-8: aom bri hasba ta ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-9: aom aa su rotta m'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-11: aom aa mri ta pri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-12: aom dzyo ti shke ta bee sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-15: gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-16: kha dog dang mthun par spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o; ;kham pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-19: dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o; ;lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-20: de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-21: de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-22: dbul po'i gdan las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171a-23: tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-0: lag na rdo @171b dge slong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-4: gzhan yang sems kyi rigs gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-5: gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-7: gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-8: nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-9: de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-14: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-15: rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-16: gza' khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-22: pra sa ra pra sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:171b-24: na ma: padma dha r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-1: h'a n'am; sarb'a sha pa ri pu ra k'a n'am na mo rakshatt'a n'a na mo dv'a da sha ra sh'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-6: sa ra sa ra; pra sa ra pra sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-8: bi kri da bi kri ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-9: m'a ra ya ma ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-11: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-15: ksh'a pa ya ksh'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-18: d'a pa ya d'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-19: bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-21: sems can thams cad la srung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-24: sgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa zlog tu gsol; ;bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-25: bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-32: au gre au gra r'u pe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-34: ma ma sarba satv'a n'anytsa ma no ra tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-35: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shthi te sa ma ye sv'ah'a; aom sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-40: padma dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-41: a'a di ty'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172a-43: dha ri n'a su t'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-1: pri ha spa ta ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-3: sha ni shtsa r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-7: badzra dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-8: padma dha r'a ya sv'ah'a; ku m'a r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-12: sarba dv'a da sha r'a shi ni bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-13: sarba au pa dra be bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-14: aom sarba bidy'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-17: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos sgrub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-18: phyag na rdo rje; gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod par byas te gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-19: de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-20: de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-23: rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:172b-25: gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:173a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:173a-3: zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-020:173a-4: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
